name: ParticleDrag

arguments.name: interpolation
arguments.desc: Interpolation method: linear, smooth, easein, easeout or constant. Default is linear.

arguments.name: fadein
arguments.desc: Fade in between t=0 and t=fadein. Default is zero.

arguments.name: fadeout
arguments.desc: Fade out between t=fadeout and t=1. Default is one.

description: Particle drag will slow down fast moving particles. It's implemented slightly different for
smoke and plain particles. Drag must be positive, and usually look good between zero and one.
